TestCase.name: testSortAgg
TestCase.Resource: select mgr, count(*) from sales.emp group by mgr order by mgr desc nulls last limit 5
LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[5]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) LogicalProject(MGR=[$3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
EnumerableLimit(fetch=[5]) EnumerableSortedAggregate(group=[{3}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$3], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testSortProject
TestCase.Resource: select mgr from sales.emp order by mgr desc nulls last
LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last]) LogicalProject(MGR=[$3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
EnumerableProject(MGR=[$3]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$3], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testSortProjectDerive2
TestCase.Resource: select distinct ename, sal*-2, mgr from (select ename, mgr, sal from sales.emp order by ename, mgr, sal limit 100) t

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0], EXPR$1=[*($2, -2)], MGR=[$1]) LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC], dir2=[ASC], fetch=[100]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], MGR=[$3], SAL=[$5]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

EnumerableSortedAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC], dir2=[ASC]) EnumerableProject(ENAME=[$0], EXPR$1=[*($2, -2)], MGR=[$1]) EnumerableLimit(fetch=[100]) EnumerableProject(ENAME=[$1], MGR=[$3], SAL=[$5]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$1], sort1=[$3], sort2=[$5], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC], dir2=[ASC]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testSortProjectOnRexCall
TestCase.Resource: select ename, sal * -1 as sal, mgr from sales.emp order by ename desc, sal desc, mgr desc nulls last
LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[DESC], dir1=[DESC], dir2=[DESC-nulls-last]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], SAL=[*($5, -1)], MGR=[$3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

EnumerableSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[DESC], dir1=[DESC], dir2=[DESC-nulls-last]) EnumerableProject(ENAME=[$1], SAL=[*($5, -1)], MGR=[$3]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testSortProjectDeriveOnRexCall
TestCase.Resource: select * from (select ename, sal * -1 as sal, max_job from (select ename, sal, max(job) as max_job from sales.emp group by ename, sal) t) r join sales.bonus s on r.sal=s.sal and r.ename=s.ename

LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0], SAL=[$1], MAX_JOB=[$2], ENAME0=[$3], JOB=[$4], SAL0=[$5], COMM=[$6]) LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $5), =($0, $3))], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0], SAL=[*($1, -1)], MAX_JOB=[$2]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], MAX_JOB=[MAX($2)]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1], SAL=[$5], JOB=[$2]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

EnumerableMergeJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $5), =($0, $3))], joinType=[inner]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$1], sort1=[$0], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC]) EnumerableProject(ENAME=[$0], SAL=[*($1, -1)], MAX_JOB=[$2]) EnumerableSortedAggregate(group=[{1, 5}], MAX_JOB=[MAX($2)]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$1], sort1=[$5], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$2], sort1=[$0], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testSortProjectWhenCastLeadingToMonotonic
TestCase.Resource: select deptno from sales.emp order by cast(deptno as float) desc
LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$7], EXPR$1=[CAST($7):FLOAT NOT NULL]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
EnumerableProject(DEPTNO=[$7], EXPR$1=[CAST($7):FLOAT NOT NULL]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$7], dir0=[DESC]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testSortProjectWhenCastLeadingToNonMonotonic
TestCase.Resource: select deptno from sales.emp order by cast(deptno as varchar) desc

TestCase.Resource: select * from (select ename, cast(job as numeric) as job, max_sal + 1 from (select ename, job, max(sal) as max_sal from sales.emp group by ename, job) t) r join sales.bonus s on r.job=s.job and r.ename=s.ename

TestCase.name: testSortFilter
TestCase.Resource: select ename, job, mgr, max_sal from (select ename, job, mgr, max(sal) as max_sal from sales.emp group by ename, job, mgr) as t where max_sal > 1000 order by mgr desc, ename

EnumerableFilter(condition=[>($3, 1000)]) EnumerableSortedAggregate(group=[{1, 2, 3}], MAX_SAL=[MAX($5)]) EnumerableSort(sort0=[$3], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[DESC], dir1=[ASC], dir2=[ASC]) EnumerableTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
